query:
SELECT id, title, 
  LENGTH(box1Content) as len1,
  SUBSTRING(box1Content, 1, 100) as sample1,
  box1Content LIKE '%;%' as has_semicolon
FROM evidences 
WHERE id = 11;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YLZPes1ubcofMz.root --database PdwWnVF2DAatRAKFwvgWXk --execute SELECT id, title, 
  LENGTH(box1Content) as len1,
  SUBSTRING(box1Content, 1, 100) as sample1,
  box1Content LIKE '%;%' as has_semicolon
FROM evidences 
WHERE id = 11;
